description: A massive gladiatorial arena on Dressrosa where fighters compete in tournaments. During the Dressrosa Arc, a tournament is held with the Mera Mera no Mi as the prize, attracting powerful fighters from across the New World.

keyEvents.title: Block C Battle Royale Continues
keyEvents.description: The fierce battle royale in Block C intensifies as the strongest fighters clash for the right to advance to the finals.
keyEvents.significance: The tournament determines who will compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

keyEvents.title: Don Chinjao Uses Conqueror's Haki
keyEvents.description: Don Chinjao unleashes Conqueror's Haki in the arena, knocking out multiple fighters and stunning the crowd.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most dramatic displays of power in the tournament.

statusHistory.reason: The colosseum is actively hosting the Block C battle

description: A forested area on Dressrosa where Doflamingo, Law, and Admiral Fujitora have their confrontation. Doflamingo uses his Tamaito technique here to create string clones.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo, Law, and Fujitora in the Forest
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo, Law, and Admiral Fujitora leave the southern beach and run into the forest, where Doflamingo uses his Tamaito technique.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the confrontation between major players in the Dressrosa conflict.
